content: Gold Armored Rhino is one of the main Yaoguai Chiefs you'll need to find in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can find it at the Rhino Watch Slope, which the Feng-Tail General will conveniently take you to.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Gold_Armored_Rhino.md", under the primary heading "Gold Armored Rhino". The content is presented below:

Gold Armored Rhino is one of the main Yaoguai Chiefs you'll need to find in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can find it at the Rhino Watch Slope, which the Feng-Tail General will conveniently take you to.
